website_summaries.verdict: A flexible, room-enhancing product with multiple functions and user options.
pros: Also acts as a light diffuser and ionizing humidifier

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been a little slow to jump on the essential oil band wagon. I'm all about seeing results before I start investing in all the paraphernalia. Well, essential oils are working for me and my family and I researched every diffuser I could find on the Internet. I chose this one because it had a much larger capacity than most and not bad ratings. It was super easy to set up and use and the color changing is a bonus feature of a night light that my son loves. It makes no noise. One fill-up lasts 3 nights for us. I want to get another, so don't raise the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stinky Bunny

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. took a leap and bought it on sale. the scent comes out strong (in the beginning, then tapers off as time goes on) and it lasts even longer than I expected. I really wanted something to last through the night and this fits the bill perfectly. I don't use the cup provided because I'm lazy and want to fill it in one go, but it's a very easy to use diffuser. the only complaint is there are a lot of beeps to turn it on and use it etc and I feel bad messing with it when people are sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Srenee1988

customer_reviews.title: Purchase THIS one!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these for my own home and office and 2 for gifts. This is the best aromatherapy device I have ever used, bar none! (I have 4 other brands...) This unit features 4 timer choices, has the ability to turn the light off while running, and provides efficient delivery of the aromatic oils. You will find this unit an excellent value and a great investment! PS - I had a problem with a unit after 3 months and I am delighted to report they sent me a new one at no charge. Thanks for taking care of me as a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Audio Guy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at my dentist's and was mesmerized. I went online, ordered thru Amazon and received it two days later. I was in need of a small, simple, easy-to-use and care-for humidifier. This was one fits the bill, plus it's very economical. I have been using it since I got it, no problems. It's peaceful, tranquil, and gives off a steady stream of cool fine mist. Wunderbar!
customer_reviews.author: Diane McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my MIU Color 500ml oils diffuser for about 6 months. It holds enough water to run at least 10 hours. I really like the different time settings but use the always "on" setting most of the time. It has a high and low setting which is nice. My grandkids always ask if I can put it in their room when they spend the night because they love the different colors as a night light. When I use it, I keep the lights off. I would recommend this diffuser to anyone. It's easy to use and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Large Capacity Diffuser that Works Great but Colors are More Muted and Pastel than Shown Which I Like Better Anyway
customer_reviews.text: The colors on MIU are more muted and pastel than shown on Amazon and I actually prefer the softness of the way the colors really do look. I love the large capacity and good mist. I do not use the timers but just set it to ON. I'm very pleased with this diffuser. It may be my favorite large capacity diffuser
customer_reviews.author: Darlaina Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Two units died within months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this diffuser while it lasted. The first unit lasted a few months and the second one I was sent last less than the first. I'm not sure the issue but based on the reviews I read before I even bought it, it is a common issue. They sent me a replacement unit for the cost of shipping and I wish I had just received a refund. I thought the reviews were just flukes but in my experience with two of these products, those reviews weren't just flukes. It just dies now when I plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: I now own 2 of these and I owned 2 other brands before. I prefer these for the large capacity and long run time. They also fill up the room quicker with the option for more mist. My daughter loves the colorful lights. So far I am loving these. I don't love the fact that when I remove the lid the condensation gets all over the place. Easily remedied with a towel. Not even sure how that could be avoided unless the shape was different.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R

customer_reviews.title: I love the color changing lights
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had mine for about 2 months now and it seems to be working just as it did the first day I got it (knock on wood) I try to clean it out if I'm not using it but for the most part I use to every night. I love the color changing lights, and the options to stick with one solid color or no color! It shuts off automatically when it's low on H2O. It has 3 different timer setting... They though of everything. I've seen much more expensive ones with all these features but why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: ant2ony

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item! I have one, my mom and grandpa both have one. My grandpa is 91 and his house sometimes can smell like medical supplies, so I ordered one for him. He loves the smell and the color changing light is a great night light for him as well. I use Eden's Garden oils- they work great with this product. I had one that was defective, and I contacted the company- the return and replacement process was seamless. I could not recommend this product more!
customer_reviews.author: CharlyL21

customer_reviews.title: Love This Diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these Aroma Diffusers for my home. It works wonderfully, right out of the box. I purchased my own oils and have had no problems. Do note that you MUST clean them out once a month to avoid build up, as they suggest, or the smell becomes dramatically lessened. Very easy to clean with Dawn Dish washing soap and a few drops of Degreaser for about an hour and rinse clean! I would highly recommend this item to anyone looking for Aroma therapy with optional light changing capacity. Also Note the original MUJI costs alot more than this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mister E!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: *update* I have had this diffuser for 4 years and it's still running. There isn't a lot of mist control, Honestly i can't tell the difference between high and low. but it is 4 years old and it still lights and it's wonderful in my bedroom, I think it dispenses aromas well. Over all I still love it. and if this one malfunctions from use and age would 100% buy it again.** this is my favorite thing I have bought I love the colors and I adore this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Megare

customer_reviews.title: Better than any of those expensive brand ones
customer_reviews.text: I live this diffuser!! Better than any of those expensive brand ones!! I have had no problems with it and I have even purchased a few more as gifts for my friends! It's peaceful and pretty at the same time while getting all the benefits. Highly recommend!! I have had young living diffusers before and this beats all of them hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality diffuser and humidifier in one!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is AMAZING. Not only is it amazing to put essential oils into the air quickly/ strong, it also acts as a humidifier that has a powerful air stream of moisture. We just moved from the midwest to Colorado where it is naturally drier. We have been so dry and wake up feeling really sick due to the lack of moisture in the air. We have used this the past week and can't even begin to rave enough on how much we sleep better and feel more relaxed. It also has the best functionality from easy buttons on the side and wide top to clean out the water. I HIGHLY recommend this. Such great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia DeFlorio

customer_reviews.title: Another broken device
customer_reviews.text: Broke just like the other reviews... I think the motor is defective and only is meant to work for 30 days or so, so you pay for a product and feel too guilty to return it. I hoped it would start to work again and it hasn't... Trying to return it, but the company wants ME to pay shipping and they MAY return the cost........... What a deal.... STAY AWAY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best diffuser of it's kind
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best diffuser of it's kind. Not too expensive. I've been happily using this model for 6 months with no problems at all. I usually keep it running for 5-8 hours everyday!!!! The aromatherapy dispenses through a wonderful stream of mist that you can set high or low. I definitely recommend this product over all the others found here at amazon.com. I have purchased and used practically all of them, MIU wins hands down!
customer_reviews.author: GirlfriendNJ

customer_reviews.title: Terrific For Few Times It Worked
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews on this one, but I thought that since I wouldn't be using the humidifier/diffuser continuously...I'd have better luck. Sadly, this wasn't the case. I only used it a handful of times and the motor started making an odd sound. And it no longer did anything else except make noise and change colors. I am giving it two stars because the few times it actually worked, it was marvelous. It's going back and I'll be looking for a better quality humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: LMR66

customer_reviews.title: After buying other diffusers that didn't last this one is ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying other diffusers that didn't last this one is the workhorse of all diffusers. It is very powerful with two settings and timed off or continuous and many more lighting setting than all the others plus a huge reservoir to last all night for diffusing. We have kept this on all night since we got it over a month ago and no problems. It is well built and the ultrasonic nebulizer is first class.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kleinkort

customer_reviews.title: My favorite diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diffuser! It holds 500ml so it runs for a really long time. The colors are fun, but the design is very easy to keep clean and to fill. I now have 2 like this. I have other kinds also, but they're not as good. I really want to replace my others with these as soon as the others fail. You can run them without lights, or cycle through all the colors, or pick one solid color. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura T. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I love the rotating color feature and the resovoir for water is so large it can run forever. I would adjust the amount of essential oils to put in as they all seem to be used up in the first couple hours. But it is easy enough to add some later. I have had this diffuser for a few months and it is still going strong. I also love that you can turn the light off completely for night time diffusing and it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holt

customer_reviews.title: HELP! stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this diffuser off and on for about 3 years and today it decided to not stay on. As soon as I turn it on, it immediately shuts off. I've cleaned it a couple times now, the water level is fine............I'm so sad. Can anyone tell me if there is something else I can do? Or, is it dead? (noooooooo :( )
customer_reviews.author: DiH

customer_reviews.title: Fill the whole room with lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: Brand new to aromatherapy so this is my first purchase for any essential oil diffuser. Despite that, I'm in love with this! I'm usually a lazy person but because cleaning is so easy, I do follow the instruction to wash after every use. Just a few drop of essential oil, it not only humidify the room but it fills the room with beautiful and relaxing scent.
customer_reviews.author: Akai

customer_reviews.title: Edit: this is great*****
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Company sent a replacement and it’s been working for 4 years. Should have updated sooner but I highly recommend. I ordered this out of the 30 day return window and it is not working! I’ve followed all directions, gently cleaned it with a paper towel, and it simply doesn’t have enought power to give any mist/vapor any more. It just makes a weird bubbly noise and no vaporizing. What a waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pony_kait

customer_reviews.title: high output, works fast, nice menu
customer_reviews.text: my title says it all. i'm happy with this purchase and it fills my big apartment (1200 sq ft) very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. Customer service was pretty good after the 2nd email I sent. My diffuser stopped working on me and they are sending me a replacement. ***Update**** My diffuser has finally bit the dust..... It turns on, lights work and can hear it humming, but its no longer diffusing. I guess its time to find a different diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diffuser. I bought my first one over six months ago, and I have had zero issues. I find that it fills the room with scent so much better than the expensive options from young living (these are the only other diffusers I have used). This particular model holds a lot of water so it will last the entire day or night of you want. The timer can be set for one-three hours or you can set it to run until the water runs out. I have bought around six of these diffusers for myself and my office/coworkers. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MLJones0903

customer_reviews.title: This diffuser hold a ton of water. Compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser hold a ton of water. Compared to my Doterra Petal diffuser, this one should be standard. With 3x's the capacity (maybe more) of water it'll run for hours. Initially, I bought this diffuser for my small classroom, but when I saw how much this held and how the output was able to fill my whole living room and kitchen (as i have an open floor plan) I kept this one at home and brought the DoTerra Petal one to my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that I wish I could take it apart to really clean it after a while. This product has the best looking design for a humidifier. Very modern and ambient look to it. The light is very bright so sleeping with it on maybe hard but you can turn it off. I love this humidifier and want like one in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Watkins

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great diffuser in our household
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great diffuser in our household. The kids use it in their rooms. I love that you can choose different lighting options - multi, or any one of the colors solidly. I also love that you can choose different time increments for how long it runs, including running it until it runs out. It's also easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so much that we have three in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that we have three in our house. I am able to turn them on in my kid room at night, have the lights cycle through, and walk away knowing the machine turns off automatically. It's quite, and lasts up to 12 hours. Comes with a convent measuring cup and simply plug in and go. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these diffusers and love them. Great output and it runs for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these diffusers and love them. Great output and it runs for a long time. I ordered one recently and had a problem with it, but Joanna at Miu customer service was super helpful. I'm very impressed with their customer service and will continue to purchase this item as gifts and for my daughter's classrooms.
customer_reviews.author: ERS

customer_reviews.title: It was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diffuser as a gift in March and it has already quit working. Very disappointing outcome. It was nice while it lasted, but don't count on it working well. There seems to be no way to contact seller about the issue either. Way too expensive to last only a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I would have given zero stars if I could. The unit won't stay on even for two seconds. The company wanted me to return the unit at my expense to replace it. Not worth it.....
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Only used it 4 times and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this 4x and it stopped working. I have no idea what happened but it doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.author: Yesi-Isa

customer_reviews.title: Compact and quiet
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser is a nice size and very efficient at dispersing the aroma scent. It has a sturdy translucent body that really lights up when the beautiful range/transition of LED colors are turned on. The language on the instructions manual suffers from some Google translate syndrome but you can get the gist of it.
customer_reviews.author: g1ddy

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, just get it! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite purchase ever. It works perfectly and it's so cool/ relaxing to fall asleep with. I add in about 2 of the little cups full of water and a few drops of 100% real essential oils (lavender, eucalyptus, or lemongrass). It smells amazing and it's so much more natural than house sprays/ scents. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Recommend good purchase
customer_reviews.text: In all I have purchased 4 of these to have in different rooms through out the house. I like that it doesn't consistanly need refilled. Puts out a good mist.
customer_reviews.author: ShaEve

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my son's room and one for mine. They work very well, are easy to clean and maintain. I like the fact it works with the lights or without the lights and I LOVE the fact that it will turn off after a set time. I also like that it shuts off when out of water. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: missdiane

customer_reviews.title: WORKS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY SECOND ONE I HAVE PURCHASED IN 5 YRS!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 2 weeks with light use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Dec 8th 2013 as a Christmas present for my wife, She opened it of course on December 25th and was very excited. She diffused the Young Living Oil thieves a few times and within 2 weeks it no longer worked. It would turn on and try to work but seemed to no longer have enough power to create any mist. We turned to the internet and tried all the various cleaning methods but in the end nothing worked. I am extremely disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved my diffuser the first week I got it! Then it started leaking. I have cleaned It according to directions. I have added water according to directions. It does not matter if I do 100ml or 500ml of water it leaks out the bottom. I emailed the adress in the instruction manual for warranty and received nothing in return. I will not buy another one because of this and I will not refer anyone to buy this. I bought more for each room in the house before I had this issue and haven't had problems. This item has turned out to be a very expensive night light. The lights are the only thing that work....
customer_reviews.author: Heather Diffee

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE diffuser hands-down.
customer_reviews.text: I love the capacity and the ability to diffuse consistently for 12 hours. We have one in each bedroom and its so easy to use that my kids can do it. I also like the fact that I can turn the light off in my bedroom but can keep it on and choose the color my kids want in their rooms to use as a night light. We love MIU.
customer_reviews.author: EnvisionVA

customer_reviews.title: We will see first impression good though
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived ..: opened up box, was packed nice, easy to set up product and use. So far so good... I love the size of the diffuser and how the whole diffuser glows. It is nice that this diffuser has a timer setting. We will see how long it holds up tho since according to others reviews it only last 6 months or sometimes less.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a diffuser for a while, but didn't want to spend $100+. I found this diffuser and thought I'd give it a try. I'm glad I did! As someone with upper respiratory issues I've worked with essential oils for some time and with the smoke from wild fires causing Orange and Red air quality alerts, I was having a difficult time breathing. Once I received this diffuser, I began to use right out of the box, and could see a difference almost immediately. I like it so much I've ordered another so I can have one in my living area as well as my bedroom. I can heartily recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: I have had them for less than a week and I really love them. Both units work very well and produce ...
customer_reviews.text: 500ml Version...I purchased 2 of these diffusers for 2 rooms of my house. I have had them for less than a week and I really love them. Both units work very well and produce a very strong mist. I have purchased other brands and have been disappointed in their performance. The MIU diffuser has given me the strong mist I love and the essential oil aroma I want in the room :)
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Not in Love with product anymore
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review - 2 working humidifiers at first now 1 unusable produstamd 1 Works when it wants to. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service wins.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 3 days after the return window. its producing vapor but its not pushing it out. The steam just softly falls out of the air exhaust. Update - customer service got back to me pretty promptly. After a small email exchange in which I described the fault to them, they offered to send out a new one free of charge. Couldn't ask for more and this one has been going steady for a week or so now. Great service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MOOD BOOST!!
customer_reviews.text: It lights up, fades colors, humidifies the air and adds a nice mood to any room. I loved it so much, I bought two more!!! We put in a few drops of various essential oils to really get some aroma therapy going. A friend at work put one in the office and I had to have one. Other people at work purchased them, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mac

customer_reviews.title: A Real Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many aroma diffuser through the years, but this one is a winner in my books! It is easy to use..... a beautiful addition to any room.......fill the room with light and color, or without if desired......it is quiet........and I especially like the water capacity.......as it will continue to fill the room with aroma and moisture for many, many hours before refilling. I think by now you know I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Annette S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Has to be one of my favorite diffusers! Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Has to be one of my favorite diffusers! Love this thing, the colors are vibrant and has a bright and a dark for each color! Has several setting to choose from! and holds quite a bit of water! I've bought several of these for myself and my family!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Bunch

customer_reviews.title: I love this difuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this difuser!!! It has worked so well for my oils and it is small enough to travel with but strong enough to be able to use it and run it all night long in my bedroom which is a fairly large size. I plan on purchasing 3 more for each of my kids room. They may like the light changing but if they don't you can turn the light off and still use the mist.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Motor went out, buy different one
customer_reviews.text: Started out working great, but within 3 months was broken; the motor simply quit working. It is worth getting a smaller tank that is near the same price and just refilling it more often. I don't recommend it, just isn't worth the money for only 3 months of diffusing.
customer_reviews.author: A. TeGrotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dorm room; the heat never shut off, leaving the air acrid and moisture sucking. I put on this humidifier during the night, and it allowed me and my roommates to sleep with ease. The auto-shutoff feature is excellent with its multiple options. Sometimes I would forget to turn it off before class, but had the security knowing it would turn off in a few minutes. I use organic eucalyptus oil in the humidifier for a purifying effect and its lovely. The lights are a fun asset and provide excitement to any dorm party. I love how this feature can be turned on without having the humidifier running.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Device is not working
customer_reviews.text: the diffuser I have received does not have vapor coming out at all, it is not working :( never did. :( I just had a baby and has been extremely busy not able to request another one, since it has been weeks now... I am not sure it is still possible to exchange, any suggestion how to fix this device is welcome or assistance in getting one that works. regards Julie
customer_reviews.author: Julie & Louka

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and runs for much longer than 10 hours
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and runs for much longer than 10 hours, but that is the recommended time to run it, so that's when I shut it off. We love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie F

customer_reviews.title: Use with Citrus Bliss!
customer_reviews.text: First diffuser I've owed. Love it so far. The light changing feature is interesting. I like that it turns itself off if the water level gets too low.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci

customer_reviews.title: This difusser is so wonderful! I went to a DoTerra essential oil class
customer_reviews.text: This difusser is so wonderful! I went to a DoTerra essential oil class! They had this difusser on display! I purchased them right there and then! So I did get to see how great it was before the purchase! I have purchased enough for all the rooms in our home! I have also purchased for gifts and the comments are all the colors are so refreshing and lovely! The price for this difusser and the quality will not leave you disappointed! I love it and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Desilou21

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and I like it better than the Young ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and I like it better than the Young Living diffuser. It goes for almost 12 hours and is ultra quiet. It also has so many different colored lights to choose from. When I'm diffusing in the morning I set it to the blues and greens and at night to the reds and yellows. Service was wonderful and they get back to you immediately if you have any questions about the product. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Ahern

customer_reviews.title: decent. .. For its short life ... RIP
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent diffuser... at first... Then the disc slowly then complete kaput. On both that I had of the same model. Almost simultaneously. And strangely on another identical unit of a different brand. Won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Moxxie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a year now and I use it daily. It works so well, and I love the different light options, time options, and diffusing options. I am so pleased with how well it has held up, I hope it doesn't break anytime soon, but if it does I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: It works excellent. The water tank is very big and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works excellent. The water tank is very big and it last a long time. The colors are beautiful and you can rotate them. you can use it so it so it changes to all the different colors or just to stay in one color.
customer_reviews.author: Yane30

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED this until it stopped working after 4 to 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this until it stopped working after 4 to 5 months of usage (regular cleaning/using only pure oils). Still lights up and the water still bubbles but not much vapor coming out of it. Expected more for the price of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a very expensive similar product from Young Living. One month after the warranty expired mine went out. I bought this for less than have the price and it's a much much better product. Holds more water. The colors are awesome and can be turned off. It doesn't seem to evaporate water as fast. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Toeplitz

customer_reviews.title: Color diffusor
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffusor. A bigger that keeps misting and turns it self off when empty. Great diffusor
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity, wish it was more powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great capacity for this diffuser. I don't feel it is powerful enough to really fill a room with scent though. I don't think the vapor is pushed far enough into the room. You have to be standing close in order to smell the essential oils being diffused.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jockers

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this review,just to make sure it was still working, so far so good, I like it because it holds a lot of water to last the whole night and then some, I do have to add quite a bit of essential oils, but it is so well worth it, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not, I repeat do not purchase this. It works great for about 2 weeks and then kaput, it just stopped. I tried to return it and that was a nightmare​, so I just tossed it in the trash. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: R.A.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much that I bought a second one for my daughter's new apartment. They love it too!! It's beautifully tranquil, quiet and does a fabulous job of dispersing the aromatherapy oils I use.
customer_reviews.author: Alice ThompsonTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. I did a lot of research on which ones were the best. I am happy I chose this one. Easy to use, easy to clean, and diffuses my oils for hours! I am very happy with. Eventually I will have one in every room!
customer_reviews.author: Grace O

customer_reviews.title: Test it before adding oil
customer_reviews.text: Does not power up! I purchased the 100ml and like it so decided to buy this 500ml one for a larger room. It does not work. I wasted 15-drops of oil, need to dig thru my recycling to find the box and go buy packaging tape to return it. Annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Lucylu

customer_reviews.title: Spa look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser...it is very much a spa feel when this is going and I'm taking a nice long relaxing bath. I put my favorite essential oils in it and set it to fade from one color to another and just totally destress. Since my original order two years ago, I have ordered two more; one for another room in my home and one for my son at his home. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: So surprised and happy
customer_reviews.text: Was so surprised how small it is but how much power it has. It last gor 10 hours and or until the water runs out. Very pleased. The colors are amazing. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pentzien

customer_reviews.title: Great Until Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing some essential oils I purchased two of these diffusers, one for me and one for my sister. Initially I loved this diffuser because it lasted overnight and was relatively quiet. However, after 2 weeks of daily use, it stopped misting. 2 days later, my sister's stopped working! I wish I could give this diffuser a better rating, but there are obviously major quality control issues. Returning both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have several different brands of diffuser but this is my favorite so far. the tank size is nice and the changing colors are attractive to look at while it runs. I have been happy with the output and it diffuses my essential oils nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: It is a super quiet machine that puts out a great mist
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited I found this diffuser! It is a super quiet machine that puts out a great mist, even on the lower setting. My family loves the way it slowly fades into the next color, unlike our Sain Sonics, which have an obvious flash as they switch - like a tv going from a show to a commercial. It's so easy to use and the soft glowing colors give the room a warm feeling. I am getting more to give as gifts for those who purchase oils from me so they can enjoy diffusing as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tamarahan Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: This one is our favorite
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought three misters of various brands, and this one is our favorite. Large capacity, easiest to clean, and the color changing lights look really nice in at night. The dog seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first. Used every night had great mist and lasted all night. Would clean frequently. Was using during the day and the auto shutoff didn't work. I smelled burning and turned it off. Fully cleaned and let dry. It turns off immediately. Had this just over 3 months and was about to buy more. Now I'm going to pick something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. It holds quite a bit of water so it runs for a long time. I wasn't sure I was going to like the lights but it is actually kind of fun and makes me smile.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these and bought them at the same time. One still works and one doesn't. Honestly I have loved this product and was so happy with it until it stopped working. Now I'm sad I spent so much money on it. Super frustrating that it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has dual settings for time to run, bright or light if you want to turn on the color and high and low for the amount of vapor. We are using it in our office and find a lot of coverage with it.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser, I loved it until it stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: "Great diffuser, I loved it until it stopped working after two months"... This was part of a review I wrote here a couple of weeks ago. MIU read it and responded immediately..They promptly sent me a new diffuser to replace the defective one I had. I am so impressed with this company. Thank you so much MIU, you are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended to me and was used literally a handful of ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me and was used literally a handful of times. All it does when I put water in it is beep and I have cleaned it and still does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Grubworm

customer_reviews.title: The best 500 ml aromatherapy device available, in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The best of five different models that I ordered. The 500 ml capacity is a much greater advantage than I would have thought. I have this in my medical office waiting room.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Skie

customer_reviews.title: To much trouble!
customer_reviews.text: All the colors are great, the humidity is great, but it only lasted 3 days now it does not work. Does it need a cleaning after only 3 days? Maybe, but what a lot of trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Danny D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two weeks. Until then it worked great and I loved it. I don't know what happened, I followed the directions and tried cleaning it. It is just plain broken.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of it, I love that it lasts for up to 3 nights! It is a great diffuser and am buying a couple for friends for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cool and colorful! Love that it has so many settings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... about this as it is my first diffuser but happily satisfied and now want one in each room (eventually)
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about this as it is my first diffuser but happily satisfied and now want one in each room (eventually)! Extremely happy with customer service when machine developed some qwarks. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KFolk

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors and the fact that I can set ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the fact that I can set the timer. I even encouraged a friend to buy one and she loves it too. We use Young Living Oils in ours. I might need another one for my studio!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alberigi McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: This thing did not even last a year for me so I would not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July of 2015 and it worked well until about a month ago. Now when I turn it on it just beeps twice and instantly turns off. The lights still work but that's about it. This thing did not even last a year for me so I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Josephs

customer_reviews.title: From extremely delighted to disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As many others have written, this diffuser is amazing when it works. We bought it for the cold air diffusion (of moisture and essential oils) to help address health issues we were facing. The light function was simply an aesthetic bonus to us. We used it for approximately 2 months and have since relocated . When we set it up in our new location, the diffusion feature no longer works. So now we just have a very expensive LED lamp. AVOID purchasing this. Any recommendations for reliable cold air diffusers are most welcome.
customer_reviews.author: LilyLou

customer_reviews.title: Really like how this diffuser works
customer_reviews.text: Really like how this diffuser works. I like that it has a large tank for water, so I can diffuse my oils all night while I sleep. It has three timer settings: 60, 120 and 180. SO if you don't want it to run for a long period of time, you can just select one of those. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Motochick118

customer_reviews.title: The light is very pretty for creating a mood
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser does not seem to work as well as others I have. Even though it's large and has a big capacity for water, the output seems small. The light is very pretty for creating a mood. However, even on a high mist mode, the effect is underwhelming. I used it to diffuse at night. Then flicked it off, woke up 6 hours later and turned it back on (a common practice in my home) and it smelled of mildew. I attempted to clean it, but it still smells that way. I'm wondering if this is true for all cold diffusers.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product that stopped working after a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item back in early November as a Christmas Gift. The lights are cool and it is really easy to use. It worked for about a week extremely well and I was very happy with it. Then after about a week it stopped working. I followed the troubleshooting tips and let it dry out completely before trying again and it was still broken. Kinda wish I would have opened it up and used it instead of giving as a gift so I could have returned it withing the time allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Randall P Silvasy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This item works very well! It has become a staple in our household, and I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Famigletti

customer_reviews.title: My fave diffuser
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this diffuser- it's like a lava lamp for essential oils! :) Everyone comments on all the fun colors and it has so many different settings to make it extremely useful and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Esthetician approved
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this defuser for a few years. I definitely would purchase another one if ever it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: lulabell

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and it stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome, until it stopped working. Like someone else had happened I was excited to get my diffuser and used it and cleaned it daily. Then one day I was ready to diffuse a essential oil and I had no vapor. I took the unit apart cleaned it well and still nothing. I have had this unit for 4 months and it pooped out on me in three. So disappointed, as it was highly recommended for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. There are better out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these as gifts for co-workers and come to find out ALL 6 broke within months! Terrible product. There are better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron F

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Tried other diffusers in the past that did not work well. This one is simple and works great! My daughter was sick last week, I have 2 of them, kept them running around the clock on high and only had to refill 2 times a day. Worked great, used one oil to help us sleep at night and others during the daytime hours. Thank You :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bennett

product_meta.title: MIU COLOR 500ml Aromatherapy Essential Oils Diffuser, 7 Color Changing Aroma Diffuser, Large Mist Humidifier, Aromatherapy Diffuser
feature_bullets: 7-Color LED Light: This cool mist humidifier has 7-color soothing LED light that you can make it cycle through or set it to one favorite one. Moreover, the light can be set to either dim or bright to suit your mood.

Large 500ml water capacity: Diffusing large mist the whole night without refill. 10 hours is not a big deal. Humidification square is 30 meters. Application: living room, bed room, office, yoga, home decor, etc.

Large Mist: Using high quality ultrasonic atomizing sheet. It can create a lovely mist that helps to humidify the air. For those who desire only a small amount of oil to be diffused in a room, this type of diffuser not only works well but can be very beautiful as well.
Powerful features: 5 timer settings so you can more fully control the output and timing of your diffuser. When the time is up or water is run out of, the diffuser can shut off automatically.
Different form traditional way of heating, combustion type hot fog, the Cold Fog Technology does not harm the essential oil of any ingredients, no secondary pollution and Safer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars951 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
